channel.title: Introduction to Java on QA June 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction to Java on QA June 2024

item.title: Java Method Declaration
item.description: Example 1: public int sum(int number1, int number2) { // Perform arithmetic operation int sum = number1 + number2; // Return result return sum; } Example 2: public void displayMessage() { System.out.println("Hello, World!"); } Example 3: public int max(int number1, int number2) { if (number1 > number2) { return number1; } else { return number2; } }

item.title: Java Variables
item.description: public class JavaVariables { public static void main(String[] args) { // Declare variables int number1; int number2; int sum; // Assign values to variables number1 = 5; number2 = 10; // Perform arithmetic operation sum = number1 + number2; // Display result System.out.println("The sum of " + number1 + " and " + number2 + " is " + sum); } }

item.title: Welcome to Java
item.description: public class WelcomeToJava { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Welcome to Java!"); } }
